comments.body: solved. Sql query statement is invaild

questions.title: Why feedFollow not work
questions.body:
I invoked feedFollow and it doesn't appears to work.


```
let query = "SELECT 'comment' as type,date_added,cert_user_id as title,body,'http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BpjbPLPb2Vyipqu2Y8Dk54ngbesNrt7iG/' as url FROM message LEFT JOIN json USING (json_id) ORDER BY date_added DESC";

this.cmd("feedFollow", [{"DemoOneMsgs": [query, [""]]}]);
```

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BpjbPLPb2Vyipqu2Y8Dk54ngbesNrt7iG/

How to add that feature on my site
